**Pulse Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Instruments**

### Title and Reference
* Title: 5K003-221146(C) - Pulse Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Instruments
* Reference Number: WS3919712501-Doc4235810869

### Tender Information

* Publication Date: September 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 17, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3919712501

### Notice Type and Method of Procurement
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Product Description and Requirements
The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) has a requirement for two (2) pulse nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) instruments to be supplied, delivered, installed, and trained. The new instruments must be capable of simultaneously determining oil content and moisture content of oil seeds samples according to ISO 10565:1998.

Additional requirements include:

* Measurement of oil content and moisture content in oil seed samples using a minimum of 25 grams of oil seed
* Analysis of small sample sizes, including less than 10 grams, for research purposes
* Delivery of all deliverables within six (6) weeks of contract award
* Installation and training of the systems

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The regions of opportunity for this tender are Manitoba and British Columbia.

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Lorraine Jenkinson
* Contact Email: [lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description and Attachments
The tender description is available on the Ariba Discovery website. No attachments are available for this tender.
